TopicTitle: Solar panels seem to be too rigid/strong even when Unbreakable Joints are off

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Home Single Language 64-bit (10.0, Build 22621) | CPU: 13th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-13700HX (24 CPUs), ~2.1GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Laptop GPU | RAM: 16

 

The solar panels seem to be too strong capable of holding the weight of a craft on their own.

Here in the video attached I had to land horizontally (i totally didn't forget adding landing legs), so I was surprised when upon doing so the solar panels didn't break  off. As shown in the end of the video the 'Unbreakable Joints' option is turned off.

I don't know if this is a bug or an intended feature so I'm reporting it,  sadly i don't have the craft file of this craft anymore as this was happened a while ago and I started a new campaign altogether a few days ago.
